Curtain Installation

ONIITO installs custom curtains and tracks: ripple fold, blackout & sheer layers, precise leveling, silent glide, and clean terminations with returns — no gaps, no light leaks.

What you get

  • Perfect leveling — aligned hems and consistent puddle or float.
  • Clean mounting — ceiling or wall tracks, hidden brackets, neat returns.
  • Silent motion — quality gliders and correct wave spacing.
  • Light control — blackout with side channels or layered sheer+blackout.

 

Recent work

True blackout

Side returns and correct projection eliminate light leaks; hem length checked by laser.

Perfect wave spacing

Consistent carriers and snap spacing create smooth ripple folds across the full span.

Clean terminations

Neat end caps, symmetrical returns, and level hems ensure a premium, built-in look.

Process

  1. Measure & plan — verify heights, stack, projection, and returns.
  2. Mount hardware — ceiling or wall tracks, anchors sized to substrate.
  3. Hang & level — set wave spacing, adjust hems, test glide and overlap.

FAQ

Do you install ripple fold systems?

Yes. We set consistent carrier spacing and wave fullness for a smooth, even look.

Can you achieve full blackout?

We add side returns, correct projection, and optional side channels to remove light leaks.

Wall or ceiling mount?

Either. We choose anchors and brackets for your substrate and desired projection/stack.
